message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet halfway and settle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $16,000 for the product. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
